Title: Will give my heart for gold: P.V. Sindhu
Content: Ecstatic but unruffled by burden of expectations after storming into the Olympic final, Indian shuttler P.V. Sindhu on Thursday said she is in fact looking forward to end ace shooter Abhinav Bindra’s
Author: PTI
